title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Software Development: SDOA-Based Enhancement of Critical Thinking and Cross-Cultural Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply six critical thinking domains (memory, comprehension, analysis, evaluation, reasoning, reflective judgment) in the scientific problem-solving process
Learners enhance their ability to evaluate the validity of scientific claims by comparing cases from diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can experience collaborative thinking processes through peer feedback on digital platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
